title: Ticket #5266: HTCondor 8.4 doesn't work with SELinux enabled
description:
From: Andy Feldt on HTCondor-users

I did a test install of HTCondor 8.4.0 (condor-8.4.0-1.el6.x86_64) on our RHEL6 systems and found that it fails to allow jobs to be submitted in our SELinux environment. This works just fine for version 8.2.9 (condor-8.2.9-335839.x86_64) and so I downgraded HTCondor back to that version so that we could continue running.

A submission under version 8.4.0 produced: 

ERROR: Failed to connect to local queue manager
AUTHENTICATE:1003:Failed to authenticate with any method
AUTHENTICATE:1004:Failed to authenticate using FS
remarks:
2015-Sep-23 16:18:37 by tim:
The problem was unreproducible.
creator: tim
